= Fonttools Test Fonts

== General

Test font files from the https://github.com/fonttools/fonttools[fonttools] Python library project.

These are minimal test fonts used for testing font parsing and manipulation functionality.

== Source

The fonts are from the fonttools repository:

* https://github.com/fonttools/fonttools/tree/main/Tests

== License

These test fonts are distributed under the same license as fonttools:

* https://github.com/fonttools/fonttools/blob/main/LICENSE

(BSD-3-Clause, Copyright (c) 2003-2024 The fonttools Authors)
